definitions.definition: clearly show the existence or truth of (something) by giving proof or evidence.
examples: their shameful silence demonstrates their ineptitude
synonyms: give away "his work demonstrated an analytical ability"

definitions.definition: give a practical exhibition and explanation of (how a machine, skill, or craft works or is performed).
examples: computerized design methods will be demonstrated
synonyms: show how something is done; Moredisplay
exemplify; informaldemo "she was asked to demonstrate quilting"

definitions.definition: show or express (a feeling or quality) by one's actions.
examples: she began to demonstrate a new-found confidence
synonyms: substantiate "the findings demonstrate important differences between men and women"

definitions.definition: take part in a public demonstration.
examples: thousands demonstrated in favor of the government
